thread.section_title: Bravofly.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bravofly.com | www.bravofly.com
thread.title: Piotr

author: Piotr
title: Piotr
text:
Bravofly agents are lying to me saying that the Garuda Indonesia arlines wants to cancel my tickets, which is not true, Garuda Indonesia left message in the booking on line 18-19-20 (bravofly agents says they cant see any message) with the name to contact to, and Garuda agent told me that I have to insist bravofly must contact Garuda on the phone number: 0 203 770 9661.
at the airport it takes five minutes to sort out situation like this, so I don't understand why it takes more than a month to fix this.
